Recent Projects

Selected biomass handling and processing projects completed by Advanced Biomass Consulting

Biomass Processing Facility Design

Complete system design for a 50 MW biomass power plant including fuel receiving, processing, and storage systems. Handled multiple feedstock types including forest residues, mill residues, and agricultural biomass.

System Design Power Generation Multi-Feedstock

Completed: 2023

Wood Pellet Handling System Upgrade

Upgraded pellet handling systems for increased throughput and reduced degradation. Implemented custom helical chutes and gentle handling equipment to maintain pellet quality throughout the process.

Wood Pellets Gentle Handling System Upgrade

Completed: 2022

Biomass Sampling System Design

Custom-designed production biomass sampling systems for quality control. Systems were third-party evaluated and shown to be within the statistical accuracy of laboratory sampling methods.

Sampling Systems Quality Control Custom Design

Completed: 2021

Northern Climate Conveyor Systems

Specialized conveyor design for extreme northern climates with temperatures reaching -40°C. Implemented cold-weather materials, heated components, and specialized enclosures for year-round operation.

Cold Climate Conveyor Systems Extreme Conditions

Completed: 2020

Pulp Mill Chip Storage Optimization

Optimization of chip storage and reclaim systems for improved inventory management and reduced material degradation. Included pile compaction analysis and automated pile management systems.

Pulp Mill Storage Systems Optimization

Completed: 2019

Rock Removal System Implementation

Design and implementation of rock and debris removal systems for forest residue processing. Integrated multiple separation technologies to achieve high removal efficiency with minimal biomass loss.

Rock Removal Forest Residues Separation Technology

Completed: 2018
